oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bluebird 78's - tape 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tape 1 of recordings of Bluebird 78 discs, featuring Miller's Merrymakers (performers), Hackberry Ramblers (performers), Happy Fats and his Rayne-Bo Ramblers (performer), New Riverside Ramblers (performers), and Jean Fuselier (performer), performing Creole tunes from the 1930's.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Miller's Merrymakers; Hackberry Ramblers; Happy Fats and his Rayne-Bo Ramblers; New Riverside Ramblers; Jean Fuselier
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- Te Ma Lessa Jolie Blonde (Miller's Merrymakers) -- Pine Island Two Step (Miller's Merrymakers) -- Lake Arthur Stomp (Miller's Merrymakers) -- Chere Tu Tu (Miller's Merrymakers) -- Cajun Breakdown (Miller's Merrymakers) -- Se Pas La Pan (Hackberry Ramblers) -- Les Crepes A Nasta (Happy Fats and his Rayne-Bo Ramblers) -- Valse De Maria Bueller (Happy Fats and his Rayne-Bo Ramblers) -- La Breakdown A Petite (New Riverside Ramblers) -- Ma Cherie Jolite (Jean Fuselier)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Happy Fats; LeBlanc, Leroy; Rayne-Bo Ramblers; Miller's Merrymakers; Hackberry Ramblers; Riverside Ramblers;
